name: Project Waifu
description:
Project waifu is a prototype of a dating simulator with anime girls, most of the images are AI generated.

for now the only two girls in the game are Aqua from konosuba and Yoruichi from bleach, but i have planned other girls too, like 2B, Konami and tohsaka rin

this game is inspired by Jump Harem

There are some things I want to introduce in the game later: a love system, a little story, different clothes for the girls, and event scenes.

Also if you have comments and suggestions leave them in the comments.
